title: Interpretation of seeing sexual intercourse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing intercourse in a dream According to Ibn Sirin's interpretation, seeing intercourse meat is associated with many psychological and physical changes that a person goes through. A certain age and one of the dreams that proves that most dreams are related to seeing intercourse, so in this article we will learn together today about the interpretation of seeing intercourse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Interpretation of a dream of seeing intercourse in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that the dream of marriage indicates the achievement of goals and that the dreamer has a distinguished position in society. Whoever sees in his dream that he is having intercourse with an enemy. His vision showed that God will grant him victory over this enemy. A well-interpreted vision is seeing intercourse with a naked woman. This vision indicates that the fears that the dreamer is going through will soon disappear. As for seeing a woman of ill repute getting married in a dream, this is a sign that the fortuneteller is following illegal ways to earn his money. Such a vision may carry a sign that its owner will commit a major sin. Dreaming of a black woman's wedding indicates that the dreamer will suffer from worries and heartaches. Anyone who dreams that he works for him is associated with him. His dream indicates that this person is rebelling against him. When a person sees in his dream that he is marrying an old man. This means that he will benefit from this old man religiously or worldly. One of the unpleasant interpretations of dreams is when a man sees himself having sex with his deceased wife. It is a sign of sadness and anxiety for the dreamer. The dream of intercourse symbolizes that the dreamer has matured psychologically and emotionally and needs to satisfy his desires so as not to harm himself. Such a dream may indicate that the dreamer does not feel safe, which negatively affected his personality and led to his weakness. There are those who interpreted this dream as a sign that the dreamer is unable to protect his privacy, which is violated by many. Whoever sees in his dream that he is having intercourse with someone feels happy. His vision showed that his thoughts have matured greatly. If a person sees in a dream that he is having sex with a famous person. Seeing him suggests that he seeks to become famous and reach the highest ranks. Interpretation of a dream about seeing intercourse in a dream for a single woman Interpretation scholars say that an unmarried girl's dream of having sex indicates that the dreamer has reached the appropriate age for marriage. This dream may indicate the disappearance of the fears that the dreamer is experiencing in reality. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is having sex with someone she knows. Her vision shows that she admires this person and wants to form a romantic relationship with him. This vision can symbolize the achievement of the goals that the dreamer wants and his success and excellence in reality. The unpleasant interpretation is that an unmarried woman sees herself having sex with a person whose features she cannot recognize because of his dark skin color. As this vision indicates a succession of problems. When a girl sees herself having sex with a man she does not know. This means that she feels upset and uncomfortable in reality. This vision may indicate the remorse of its owner as a result of his impulsiveness in making some decisions. If the man with whom an unmarried woman had intercourse in a dream is her fiancé. The vision heralds the completion of her marriage to him.

title: Interpretation of seeing a big snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com as seeing large snakes in a dream, as it symbolizes many enemies in a dream. The life of the dreamer and the attempt to win it, as the interpretation of the vision varies depending on the color and size of the snake, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article about a single, married and pregnant girl. A man, a young man, and a divorced woman. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream? Seeing a large snake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates the large number of enemies in the dreamer’s life and his diligence in defeating them. Seeing a snake in a dream and talking to it kindly is evidence of good behavior among people and people’s need. To solve their problems with their wisdom and minds. Seeing a snake running in a dream indicates that it brings goodness and abundance to the visionary and attempts to solve his problems and resolve his worries. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake’s tongue in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a water snake in a dream? Seeing a water snake in a dream and its closeness to the witness of the vision is an indication of Weakness and the collapse of worry and anxiety are approaching, and for the patient his speedy recovery is approaching and he will enjoy good health. Seeing a snake bite on the fortuneteller’s leg is one of the bad visions that symbolize the presence of liars and cheaters in the fortuneteller’s life and an attempt to stay away and warn against them. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake bite in a dream What is Nabulsi’s interpretation of the vision A black snake in a dream? Seeing a black snake in Imam Nabulsi’s dream indicates intense envy of the pioneer or bad friends in his life. Seeing a green snake in a dream indicates the coming of goodness, blessings and happiness soon. Seeing living in a dream Its interpretations vary according to its color and shape, as its appearance indicates its distance. About every evil or evil. What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream? Seeing a large snake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen indicates that he heard good news for his heart, and that the debtor must pay all his debts, and that the patient recovers from his chronic diseases. A single young man sees a snake A large snake in a dream. It indicates the approaching of his happy marriage, and for a poor man, the acquisition of great wealth that changes his life completely. See also: I saw the snake in a dream, so what does it interpret? What is the interpretation of one person seeing a large snake in a dream? A single girl sees a huge snake in a dream. It shows that he will have Many good children and they will have a bright and brilliant future. Seeing an unmarried woman with a long beard in a dream is a sign of her desire to marry the love of her life and start a happy life with him. Seeing a white snake entering a bachelor’s bag indicates achieving great profits and success through her work. Seeing a single woman because of the presence of Large snakes in her house. It indicates her wonderful success in study and work. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for Al-Nabulsi? Seeing a snake in a dream for Al-Nabulsi. It indicates a happy pregnancy or that the fortuneteller holds a great and important position in the state. Seeing a large snake In the dream, her appearance appears to be a penguin

preview.html: It can indicate completely different meanings for a single girl and a single man, and in this article we will explain the meaning of the vision through our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a group of dates in a dream for a single girl. The unmarried girl ate turnips, and it tasted delicious in a dream, and she wanted to eat A lot. The vision shows the end of all the problems of an unmarried girl who lives in it. Seeing an unmarried girl buying a cake and eating from it, and the price was high. The vision suggests that she will marry a man who respects and respects her. If the girl sees that she sees herself baking the keleta in a dream and then eating it. The vision shows that she will get rid of all her problems, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl eating turnips is evidence that her longing desire will come true. A single girl’s dream of cooking kaleta in her dream is evidence that she is struggling hard to achieve her goal. Or a sign that she is preparing for her wedding soon, God willing. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl eating a rotten kidney in a dream is a sign of bad luck. See also: What is the interpretation of eating celery in a dream? Interpretation of seeing an accumulation of dates in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams of her husband asking her to eat bread in a dream. The vision suggests that the woman A married woman will see a lot of goodness and blessings. A married woman saw eating a large number of cakes in a dream. He felt comfortable eating voraciously, and the vision showed an abundance of sustenance. To see a married woman baking a large amount of cakes in her dream, the vision symbolizes the end of many problems in Her life. To dream of a married woman eating bread is a sign of happy circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about eating a kilogram in a dream for a married woman with her husband. The vision interprets that she lives a stable life with her husband. Seeing a married woman eating a dry kidney in a dream. The vision is interpreted as facing many Problems, but tolerant and patient. Seeing a married woman while cooking vegetables in her dream. The vision is interpreted as full force preparation for a great challenge coming in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman giving her a kidney in a dream, the vision interprets good news or an imminent pregnancy. As for seeing a woman married to a stranger in a dream, who gives her a hook in a box, the vision indicates that the dreamer will soon receive an inheritance. Interpretation of seeing a bunch of dates in a dream for a man and its meaningIf someone sees a clip in front of him and the price is very high and they cannot buy it. The vision indicates that the dreamer will suffer a lot in his life, and God knows best. Seeing a man eating a piece of teat and tasting it was a pleasant thing. The vision shows the goodness that will come to him soon and its source will be legitimate. If a person dreams that he eats large quantities of kleija in the dream and is pleased with it. It symbolizes Seeing goodness and blessings in the dreamer’s life without feeling unhappiness in life. For a married man to see that his wife is cooking a kidney in a dream and giving it to him is considered a praiseworthy vision, as it is a sign of the approaching pregnancy. Eating a kidney in a dream is for a man

title: Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream

preview.html: Today we will present to you the interpretation of chickpeas in a dream in different cases. Chickpeas are legumes and are grown in the Middle East and the Mediterranean. They have many uses and have a distinctive taste, light yellow color, and a round shape. This type is the most common. Compared to other colors such as green, red and black, chickpeas contain vitamins, proteins, minerals and fibers, so today we will present to you the interpretation of chickpeas in a dream in this article in the Encyclopedia through the following lines. Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream Interpretation of seeing chickpeas in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing chickpeas in a dream as an indication that the dreamer will get a lot of money after hardship and fatigue for a long time. If one sees in a dream that he is eating hot chickpeas, this indicates a woman in reality. But if one sees in a dream that he is eating raw chickpeas, this indicates many worries, problems and troubles in the dreamer's life. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating chickpeas in a dream, and he eats them the next day in reality, this is a sign of the arrival of abundant food and blessing. Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees chickpeas in her dream, this indicates the arrival of positive energy for her, abundant kindness and livelihood. But if an unmarried girl sees dry chickpeas in a dream, this means that there will be a moody and hot-tempered man in her life. If a girl sees An unmarried woman in her dream sees dry chickpeas in her bag, this means that this girl is suffering from a financial crisis. But if an unmarried girl sees chickpeas in her dream, this means that this girl sticks to her opinion in the matter. Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees green chickpeas in a dream, this is evidence of the arrival of abundant food, kindness and blessings, in addition to hearing good news in the near future. But if a married woman sees dry chickpeas in her dream, this indicates that she will suffer from problems and difficulties in her married life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating dry chickpeas, this indicates many problems and disputes between her and her husband and children. But if a married woman sees that she was cooking pork in a dream, this indicates that her financial situation will become better than it is. And for a married woman to see in a dream that her husband brings her a large plate of chickpeas and eats a lot of them and she is happy, this indicates that she will be pregnant. And if a married woman sees that she has prepared a large plate of cooked chickpeas, and presented it to her husband, but its taste did not please him very much, But he thanked her for that, and this indicates that the couple loves each other and their life is stable. Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees that she gave birth to a beautiful girl and fed her fresh chickpeas that were cooked, this indicates that this woman will have a lot of good for her and her child. But if you see a pregnant woman in a dream eating a large plate of chickpeas because she feels very hungry, this indicates that

title: What is the most accurate interpretation of a dream about snakes by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lot of snakes: When someone sees a snake in front of him in reality, he is very afraid, so what if he saw it in a dream? It is natural for him to wake up from his sleep carrying intense anxiety in his heart and want to know its interpretation and the symbols it symbolizes. The anxiety arises from the assumption that this harmful creature carries qualities of cunning and treachery. It bites a person without realizing it and can take his life in moments. What is the interpretation of a dream of many snakes? If someone sees this dream, he should pay attention to those around him. Some of them try to harm him and harbor intense enmity and hatred for him, and the dream is a warning sign to warn against them, and according to the details of the vision you will find many interpretations related to it. The long and large snake expresses a brutal person in the dreamer’s life, but he does not know what bad feelings he is hiding that make him not hesitate to harm him. If he sees it wrapped in a circle and hidden from his sight, then this is a bad accident that may happen to him, or that one of his children will fall seriously ill in the coming period. If the fortuneteller has money and money, then he is the center of attention, and there are those who wish that his money will perish out of hatred and envy towards him. If he As a young man, he should be careful of his friends. Some of them want to lead him down the path of deception that he is on, and if he deviates from them, it will be difficult for him to return until he loses a lot, either losing his loyal friends or losing his money. If he is one of the rich. As for the fortuneteller, if he is an employee of a company and there are many problems at work, then seeing many snakes is a sign that the cause of these problems is some colleagues who do not want his presence and are trying to get him into trouble. Until he was released. Seeing many snakes is a sign of the evils that surround the dreamer and disturb him in his life. Interpretation of a dream about many snakes by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that snakes have many types and colors, including snakes and snakes, and in general, their appearance expresses the danger that surrounds him from those closest to him and those Do not suspect it or expect harm from it. If you see it in your home, there is someone from your family who does not love you well and you should not reveal your secrets to him so that he does not blackmail you with them at the same time. If he sees that there are people who have turned into snakes, then they are actually like that in reality. They are not good at treating others honestly, but they They hide behind people who speak softly and in return plot to destroy those who don't. Such as: There are white snakes and others of different colors, and the most dangerous thing is to see black snakes. It means people with very bad morals who resort to magic to harm others and ruin their lives. But if the man himself allows the snake to follow him into his home, then the man has bad morals and does not care about the sanctities of his home, until bad friends enter it, which harms his reputation. It affects all family members, and affects the children in the future, and he must fear God and repent for his great sin in order to protect his home and his children from gossip. What is the interpretation of a dream of many snakes for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream of many snakes for a single woman

title: Interpretation of seeing silver in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a silver chain in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a girl wearing a chain. In her dream, it is a sign of abundant sustenance for her. Holding the silver chain and it was heavy, which indicates responsibility in the coming period. If the silver contains corrupt metals, it means that she is in conflict with someone close to her. A silver bracelet in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be influenced by a person who is rich in money. title: What is the interpretation of a white man’s clothing in a dream?

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you the interpretation of a man’s white dress in a dream, according to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book. White is a happy color that spreads psychological comfort and tranquility in the soul. Find out what the interpretation of this dream is, so that his heart is at peace, and for this reason we will explain to you in the following paragraphs the encyclopedic interpretation of a dream of a white dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin. To get a young man and in detail for married people, so follow us. Interpretation of a white man’s dress in a dreamInterpretation of a white dress in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says Sirin: Seeing white clothes in a dream is a praiseworthy dream, which brings good connotations to the dreamer. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is wearing a white dress, this is a sign that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better and that this good intention will enter his life. Seeing yourself wearing a white dress In a dream, it indicates the dreamer’s repentance for the sins he committed and gives him good news that God has forgiven him and his repentance. Seeing a white dress in a dream means that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money in the coming period. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is wearing white clothes and his clothes are unclean, this is a sign On the problems that the dreamer will suffer from in the coming period. Seeing white clothes in a dream indicates the arrival of sorrows and unpleasant news in the dreamer’s life. A man’s white dress in a dream. If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is wearing a white dress, this is a sign that he will get a job. New, or being promoted in his job. Also, seeing a white man’s clothing in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates that he will get married soon. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is wearing pure white clothes, this is a sign that he will meet a girl with virtuous morals, and that she will be religious. If the dreamer is a student and sees in his dream that he is wearing a white dress, this indicates his excellence in his studies and obtaining the highest grades. This vision also indicates that the dreamer enters the college he desires. Seeing white clothes in a young man’s dream indicates a change in his circumstances and the beginning of a stage. New in his life. In general, seeing a white dress for a young man in a single young man’s dream is a good dream that carries good connotations. Interpretation of a dream about a man wearing a white dress. If a man sees in his dream that he is wearing a white dress, this is a vision that brings good news to him and heralds him a prominent position in society, Especially if he is wearing a silk dress. If the man who has the dream is suffering from problems and sees in a dream that he is wearing a white dress, this is a sign of the collapse of worries and getting rid of the problems that are bothering him. And if the dreamer is suffering from accumulating debts in reality and sees in his dream that he is wearing clothes Clean white, then this is a good vision that indicates the payment of all his debts. Seeing white clothes in a patient’s dream, foretells a speedy recovery and that God will grant him health and well-being. Seeing him wearing white pants in a man’s dream means a promotion in a job, or obtaining a new job, or that he He will make a large profit from his job. If a man sees in his dream that he is buying new clothes

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about being stabbed with a knife for unmarried women

preview.html:
Interpretation of a dream of a knife for a single woman in a dream is one of the dreams that can cause anxiety and panic in the dreamer and make him want to know the interpretations and connections expressed by the vision. In fact.Interpretation of dreams about being stabbed with a knife for single women: Being stabbed with a knife in a girl’s dream is evidence of the difficulties she is experiencing in real life, in addition to her entering a difficult period in which it is difficult to resolve many crises, and this has a negative impact on the psychological and physical state of the dreamer. Seeing a lover stabbing an unmarried girl in her dream is a sign of betrayal and betrayal by some close people, in addition to the presence of a malicious friend who seeks revenge and puts her in troubles and troubles that the dreamer finds difficult to obtain. get rid of. Who: Stabbing a sister in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of family disputes that make the dreamer’s relationship with her family weak and disjointed, and it takes a long time to restore the good relationship again, but she continues trying without getting bored or despairing. Interpretation of a dream about stabbing an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin: Watching a stabbing With a knife in the dreamer's dream is an indication of the inability to deal with the obstacles that stand in their way and prevent them from achieving goals and aspirations. A dream in which you see a knife being stabbed by an unmarried woman in a dream may indicate that she is committing many sins and transgressions that lead the dreamer away. By Almighty God and causes her to go on an inappropriate path, her end will come to an end. It will be a huge loss and deep sadness. The dream of being stabbed with a knife in a dream is evidence of a person’s attempt to destroy his stable life, as a result of the hatred and resentment that he carries in his heart towards the dreamer because of the success and progress achieved in her work.
ZOE.Interpretation of dreams about a knife with a knife for a lonely woman in the stomach. Seeing a lonely girl being stabbed in the stomach is evidence of the feelings of stress and tension that she is currently experiencing and finds it very difficult to get rid of, in addition to the presence of some problems and obstacles present within her. she has. The road and preventing her from continuing the journey towards her goal. The dream interpretation of being stabbed with a knife in a dream is evidence of the presence of a close person who carries in his heart a lot of hatred and malice towards the dreamer and is jealous of her stable life, and with the passage of time his desire to destroy her grows and he sees her sad and alone. A dream of stabbing a girl may indicate... Dreaming with a knife indicates that you are facing a major crisis that the dreamer is unable to solve, but he continues trying to get rid of it without giving up. Interpretation of dreams about stabbing a knife in the abdomen without blood for one woman. Stabbing one girl in a dream without blood coming from her abdomen is a sign of failure in professional and academic life, in addition to entering In a toxic emotional relationship that only brings sadness and unhappiness and leads to a state of severe depression. Trying to stab an unmarried woman in the stomach with a knife is a sign of the presence of evil people in her life, and she must be careful and pay close attention to them so that she does not fall victim to their evil and hatred. . Except for the need to take care of her life and herself. A dream about stabbing an unmarried woman in the abdomen may indicate deficiency

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a male or female child in a dream

preview.html: The birth of a woman is a joy and happiness in every home, but have you seen in your dream that there is a birth situation in someone around you or someone you know, and you may also be interested in knowing: Apricots in a dream, we will explain the evidence for the interpretation of this vision and its various meanings and we will explain the interpretation of seeing the birth of a male child Or a female in a dream for a married or unmarried woman, as well as for a man, and we will explain the interpretations included in the vision. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a male or female child in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a male or female child in a dream. Many interpreters explained that if you see the birth of a male child In a dream, this means that his state of anxiety and sadness will end, and this indicates that there is comfort, comfort, and happiness that this dreamer will enjoy, and this indicates an approach to sustenance and kindness for this dreamer. If a married man sees that his wife has given birth to a child, this indicates that there is good livelihood. He and his wife will receive it abundantly. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth and gives birth to a boy, this indicates that this woman will be blessed with a baby girl. You may also be interested in learning: Driving an Arab in a dream In case the woman sees a male giving birth, and this birth was in a beautiful place In an atmosphere of happiness and kindness, this indicates the end of anxiety and sorrow and the approach to solving various problems that bind the members of society. Family. The interpretation of seeing the birth of a male or female child in a dream explained that if you see the birth of a female child, this indicates comfort and happiness. Watching the birth of a woman in a dream indicates that there is a state of nourishment and wealth that the members of that family will enjoy. And the dream of giving birth, whether male or Female, evidence of rest and comfort after excessive exhaustion, as seeing a person giving birth indicates that he will be relieved of the problems of his future life. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a male or female child in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations explained that if an unmarried girl sees the birth of a child and she For a female, this indicates that she is getting rid of a negative life or what is bothering her and shows a noticeable improvement in her psychological condition. It suggests that she will get rid of many of the problems that have plagued her for a long time. A dream about an unmarried woman giving birth indicates that she is offering help to everyone around her, and it also shows that she is a girl who obeys God Almighty and works to please those around her. You may also be interested in knowing: Burning clothes in a dream explained The interpretation of seeing the birth of a child or a female child in a dream for an unmarried woman is that if an unmarried girl sees that she is giving birth and this child is a male, this indicates that she is close to normal life and this life will be rejoicing. In the event that an unmarried girl sees the birth of a male, and these children are Difficult, this is evidence that there are great worries and sadness that this girl is carrying or that she has committed a great sin. He is afraid that it will be revealed. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a male or female child in a dream for a married woman. Various interpretations have explained that if a married woman sees that she is giving birth and she gave birth next to someone

title: Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving fodder to the living in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person giving fodder to a living person in a dream. Some may want to know the interpretation of a dream that a dead person gives him fodder to a living person in a dream. One of the dreams that many people want to know is an interpretation, let us know, its interpretation by some diligent interpreters, and the reader should know that it is the jurisprudence of scholars, so the site has nothing to do with it. With interpretations, even by diligent scholars seeking to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving fodder to the living in a dream. Seeing a dead person giving food to the living in a dream may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer during those days, thanks to God. Seeing taking fodder from the dead in a dream could It indicates positive changes that may occur to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of taking fodder from the dead in a dream indicates the good changes that will occur to the vision, or the ability to satisfy desires and dreams, and God knows best. It is possible that it is a vision. Receiving fodder from the dead in a dream indicates many good things that the dreamer can achieve in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dry fodder in a dream. Receiving dry fodder in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life. During this time, and God knows best. If there is a vision of buying chicken feed in a dream, this may indicate good changes that will happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, thanks to God. The vision of eating animal feed in a dream may indicate diseases that may affect insight, and God knows best. Seeing storing dry fodder in a dream may indicate distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sifting flour in a dream Seeing a fine sieve in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer may acquire in his life during this time. , thanks to God. In the event that a person sees sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate wrong words received by the dreamer and his family and he must ask God for help. Seeing sifted flour in a dream may indicate losing money in a bad market during this time, by God. I know. Seeing a fine sieve in a dream could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting barley in a dream: Collecting barley in a dream may indicate material gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time, and God knows best. I know. If one sees that he is collecting barley in a dream, this may indicate the material gains and extensive life that the dreamer may achieve during this period, thanks to God. If one sees harvesting barley in a dream, it may indicate his closeness to God Almighty, and avoiding disobedience and sins. During this period, thanks to God. If a person sees a harvest of barley in a dream, this may indicate the material gains and gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of barley in the house in a dream. The presence of barley in the house in a dream.
